search_results.query: Speech and Language Processing: An Introduction to Natural Language Processing, Computational Linguistics, and Speech Recognition

snippet.title: Yahoo buys Siri-like natural language software startup
snippet.description: SkyPhrase could help Yahoo fold speech recognition into more of its products.

snippet.title: Microsoft brings speech recognition to Bing developers
snippet.description: Microsoft continues to flesh out its Bing developer platform with a new speech-recognition control, allowing coders to add speech input to their Windows 8 and Windows 8.1 apps.

snippet.title: Motorola Droid Maxx
snippet.description: If you can get past its steep price, the massive-screened Motorola Droid Maxx is currently Verizonâ€™s best Android smartphone.

snippet.title: Microsoft revs speedier, smarter speech recognition for phones
snippet.description: Using a novel method that mimics brain functions, Microsoft researchers say they've doubled the speed at which speech is recognized and results are returned. They've also improved accuracy by 15 percent.

snippet.title: Gesture recognition will be a slam-dunk, startup head says (Q&A)
snippet.description: User interfaces are changing with touch, voice, and -- now -- gestures. EyeSight Mobile CEO Gideon Shmuel believes gesture recognition will transform our expectations of PCs, phones, TVs, and tablets.

snippet.title: 3 apps for mobile language learning (roundup)
snippet.description: Want to make use of your free time by learning a new language? Check out these three apps that help get the job done.

snippet.title: Report: Apple will bring text-to-speech conversion to Notes
snippet.description: According to Patently Apple, the tech giant has filed for a European patent for a system that can translate text into multiple languages and then convert it to speech.

snippet.title: AT&T ups the ante in speech recognition
snippet.description: AT&T showed off some of its intelligent speech and language recognition technology recently, demonstrating possible applications for future generation products.

snippet.title: Mixbook sees 'perfect storm' for Google's Dart language (Q&A)
snippet.description: Not everybody likes Google's JavaScript competitor for Web programming, but Mixbook's CEO and lead developer are betting a multimillion-dollar revenue stream on it.

snippet.title: Duolingo for Android
snippet.description: As language learning apps go, Duolingo is a fantastic option that's completely free, but don't expect it to help you become completely fluent.
